team.bioHtml: Payfor, the one-stop B2B Debt Collection specialist.  Cross-border Legal Collection working with law firms delivering an effective solution for SMEs worldwide.

jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
Looking for a savvy biz-dev pro with minimum 3 years experience to take over and kick-start Payfor's lead gen, biz-dev and sales processes.  

You should be experienced and knowledgeable with the latest up-to-date ways of securing new leads.

Initially working on commission only but with the freedom and independence to generate limitless compensation. A full-time, salary will be offered to successful candidates that pass the initial 3-month trial.

Do not apply if you are not demonstrably living in London, UK. You application will be turned down automatically.
